PERSONA:
meet james, a 67-year-old married white man living in a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region of the united states. he was born and raised in the country and has never lived abroad.

james has some college education but did not complete a degree. he identifies as a protestant and attends religious services seldomly. politically, he aligns with the democratic party and considers himself a moderate or conservative democrat.

james comes from a middle-income household, earning between $30,000 and $40,000 annually. he is a registered voter and takes his civic duty seriously. in his free time, james enjoys using the internet multiple times a day to stay connected and informed.

while james does not currently volunteer, he is open to exploring opportunities that align with his interests and values. he leads a comfortable life, surrounded by the familiar sights and sounds of his metropolitan hometown in the south atlantic region.
